text: Arau karaobara ocarata satpatha prakasa horaara pichata yadi si raachulara biraud'dhacarana karae arau muminasakalara pathara bahirae an'ya patha anusarana karae, tente ami taka se'iphale'i ubhata'i dima yiphale si ubhati yaya arau taka jahannamata praraesa karaama, arau seya kimana ye beya abasasthala
